content: That's really interesting. I didn't know the Carson City Mint was so significant. I'd love to add an 1889-CC Morgan dollar to my collection one day, but it seems like it might be out of my budget for now. I'll have to keep an eye out for more affordable options. In the meantime, I'm curious to learn more about error coins, which I heard about at the coin collector's club meeting. What can you tell me about error coins?
